HEAD.title: Pennsylvania Spatial Data Access | Full Metadata

DIV.PRE: Delaware Basin NGOs and local governments, armed with greater knowledge and informed with improved land conservation, conservation finance, land use, and other practices, will increase the volume and quality of their work, achieving better water resource protection outcomes in the Basin. Improvements in water quality will also follow from improvements in public policy, which in turn will follow from higher engagement by NGO staff and volunteers in public policy advocacy that is stimulated by the grant-funded work. Purpose: The purpose of this map is to combine multi-state conserved land datasets into a singular form with common attribute fields that follow that of the Protected Areas Database of the United States (PAD-US) for the area that is the Delaware River Basin. Protected land categories follow that of the PA Conserved Lands map. This dataset can be used in the analysis of potential water quality improvements; alternative approaches to stewardship; riparian buffer development; and prioritization of land protection prospects within the Delaware River Watershed.

Sources: PAD-US 2.1 (Release Date: 2020-09-15 Publication Date: 2020-12-23): https://www.usgs.gov/core-science-systems/science-analytics-and-synthesis/gap/science/protected-areas U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) Gap Analysis Project (GAP), 2020, Protected Areas Database of the United States (PAD-US) 2.1: U.S. Geological Survey data release, https://doi.org/10.5066/P92QM3NT. National Conservation Easement Database (NCED 20200828): https://www.conservationeasement.us/ PA Conserved Lands: https://palta.maps.arcgis.com/apps/webappviewer/index.html?id=989d032b768c4bcebf0824b2fb79cc89
https://njogis-newjersey.opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/NJDASADC::njfpp-preserved-farms https://njogis-newjersey.opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/njdep::state-local-and-nonprofit-open-space-of-new-jersey https://firstmap-delaware.opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/delaware-forestry-conservation-easements https://firstmap-delaware.opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/delaware-land-and-water-conservation-fund https://firstmap-delaware.opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/delaware-natural-areas https://firstmap-delaware.opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/delaware-nature-preserves https://firstmap.gis.delaware.gov/arcgis/rest/services/Society/DE_OutdoorRecreation/ https://firstmap-delaware.opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/delaware-public-protected-lands https://firstmap-delaware.opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/delaware-forest-land-preservation https://firstmap-delaware.opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/delaware-ag-lands-preservation https://gis.ny.gov/gisdata/inventories/ https://www.usgs.gov/core-science-systems/science-analytics-and-synthesis/gap/science/pad-us-data-download?qt-science_center_objects=0#qt-science_center_objects https://services.arcgis.com/P3ePLMYs2RVChkJx/arcgis/rest/services/Agency_Type/FeatureServer https://www.arcgis.com/home/user.html?user=esri_landscape2

Disclaimer: Data is updated periodically to reflect additions to and transfers of conserved lands between land trusts and government organizations. Please contact individual land trusts or state government organizations for the most up-to-date report on their conservation metrics.
